item.title: The Connection that's Missing: The Impact of Direct Effect, CETA/TTIP, and Investor-State Dispute Settlement
item.description:
By Daniel Thym, Chair of Public, European and International Law, University of Konstanz International trade agreements, particularly the proposed deals between the EU and the US (TTIP) and Canada (CETA), have garnered significant public interest. item.description:
